TextBlock.Text: BASIL: I ripped the warp core out of the Central Station.
BASIL: Now, me, you may ask "Why did you tear the warp core out of your own vessel? You're trapped here now!"

BASIL: Foolish question! I inserted it INTO the SSPU! The sheer energy of the compacted star of Sunset Sister gives the warp core enough power for a noticable warp back in time. In other words, TIME BENDS BEFORE MY WILL!
